# iOS Swift Documentation References

This directory contains curated documentation references for the ios-swift stack.

## Official Documentation

All agents and skills in this stack have **permission to research before asking**. When implementing features, consult these authoritative sources:

### Core Framework
| Technology | Documentation URL | Notes |
|------------|-------------------|-------|
| Swift | https://docs.swift.org | Language reference |
| Swift Book | https://docs.swift.org/swift-book | Comprehensive guide |
| SwiftUI | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui | UI framework |
| SwiftData | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftdata | Persistence |

### Apple Frameworks
| Technology | Documentation URL | Notes |
|------------|-------------------|-------|
| Foundation | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/foundation | Core utilities |
| UIKit | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/uikit | UI components |
| Combine | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/combine | Reactive programming |
| Observation | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/observation | @Observable |

### Networking & Data
| Technology | Documentation URL | Notes |
|------------|-------------------|-------|
| URLSession | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/foundation/urlsession | Networking |
| Codable | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swift/codable | JSON handling |
| CloudKit | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/cloudkit | Cloud sync |

### Testing
| Technology | Documentation URL | Notes |
|------------|-------------------|-------|
| XCTest | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/xctest | Test framework |
| Swift Testing | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/testing | New in Swift 6 |
| UI Testing | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/xctest/user_interface_tests | UI automation |

### Design Guidelines
| Resource | Documentation URL | Notes |
|----------|-------------------|-------|
| HIG | https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines | Design guidelines |
| SF Symbols | https://developer.apple.com/sf-symbols | Icon library |
| Typography | https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/typography | Font guidelines |

### App Store
| Resource | Documentation URL | Notes |
|----------|-------------------|-------|
| App Store Guidelines | https://developer.apple.com/app-store/review/guidelines | Review requirements |
| App Store Connect | https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect | Distribution |
| In-App Purchase | https://developer.apple.com/documentation/storekit | Monetization |

## Research Protocol

When implementing any feature:

1. **Check Apple docs first** - Use the URLs above
2. **Verify iOS version support** - Check availability attributes
3. **Follow HIG** - Match Apple's design patterns
4. **Check WWDC sessions** - For implementation guidance

## Key Documentation Sections

### SwiftUI
- Views: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/views-and-controls
- Layout: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/layout
- Navigation: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/navigation
- State: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftui/state-and-data-flow

### SwiftData
- Models: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftdata/model()
- Queries: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftdata/query
- Relationships: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swiftdata/relationship

### Concurrency
- Async/Await: https://docs.swift.org/swift-book/documentation/the-swift-programming-language/concurrency
- Actors: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swift/actor
- Tasks: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/swift/task
